titles.title: To provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of chlorinated isocyanurates.
To provide for the reliquidation of certain entries of chlorinated isocyanurates.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Directs U.S. Customs and Border Protection to provide for the liquidation or reliquidation of certain entries relating to chlorinated isocyanurates.
